LineText: Darth Vader...
Ah, yes... The infamous Boba Fett...
I have heard a lot about you Fett...
They say that you are ruthless and the most feared bounty hunter in the galaxy. And many more things...
I have a task for you.
What is it?
Imperial Colonel Abal Karda deserted and escaped on planet called Maryx Minor.
He stole a box with crucial information for the empire.
Kill him and bring the box back to me!
What is the payment?
Ten thousand credits.
Is this a joke? Thirty!
Dont't mess with me Fett!
Bounty on regular deserter's head isn't worth thirty thousand credits!
If he was just a regular deserter, you would not hire me for this job.
Your imperial army clearly can't get him.
Don't test my patience! Twenty thousand credits is my final offer!
I agree.
Good... One last thing...
Under any circumstances do not open the box!!!
Am I clear?!
Yes, I understand.
Excellent. Start right now.
I'm on my way...
